@graph.description: ARPEGE-Climat Version 6.3 is the atmospheric component of the CNRM climate and Earth System models (CNRM-CM6-1 and CNRM-ESM2-1).
@graph.name: Arpege-Climat Version 6.3

@graph.description: UniCiCles (Unified Model-CISM-BISICLES) is a package combining BISICLES with an interface that obtains boundary conditions from Unified Model or JULES data.
@graph.name: BISICLES-UKESM-ISMIP6-1.0

@graph.description: The Community Land Model represents several aspects of the land surface including surface heterogeneity through a nested subgrid hierarchy.
@graph.name: CLM4

@graph.description: Global Experimental Leads and sea ice for ATmosphere and Ocean.
@graph.name: GELATO

@graph.description: HadAM3 is the atmospheric component of HadCM3, a coupled atmosphere-ocean general circulation model developed at the UK Met Office Hadley Centre.
@graph.name: HadAM3

@graph.description: Nucleus for European Modelling of the Ocean version 3.6 (OPA).
@graph.name: NEMO v3.6

@graph.description: Pelagic Interaction Scheme for Carbon and Ecosystem Studies model volume 2 version trace gases.
@graph.name: PISCESv2-gas

@graph.description: The chemistry scheme of CNRM-ESM2 is an on-line scheme whereby the chemistry routines are part of the physics of the atmospheric climate model.
@graph.name: REPROBUS-C (v2.0)

@graph.description: SURFEXv8.0 encompasses several submodules for modeling the interactions between the atmosphere, the ocean, the lakes and the land surface.
@graph.name: SURFEX v8 modeling platform

@graph.description: TACTIC (Tropospheric Aerosols for ClimaTe In CNRM) is an interactive tropospheric aerosol scheme, able to represent the main anthropogenic and natural aerosol types in the troposphere.
@graph.name: TACTIC
